name: Journey to Love
description:
This is a two player co-op experience created during Brains Eden 2018. In 48 hours we had to create a game that related to the theme 'Unreliable'.  Void (The team name) made a game called 'Journey to Love' where two players have to work together to reach the beach where their lover is. The problem? The car. It is most unreliable. 

Avoid boulders and canyon walls. Work together to prevent flat tires. 

This game can also be seen as a lesbian threesome. Does not contain graphic lesbian trio action. I'm sorry. This was planned as you can probably tell.

TO PLAY

  • For ease: Play with a friend.
  • Two Xbox controllers
